original_text: Sometimes a bad spirit takes hold of him and then he screams. The spirit throws his body first one way then another and water comes out of his mouth. The spirit gives him a lot of pain and it does not leave him alone very much.
korean_text: 귀신이 그를 잡아 갑자기 부르짖게 하고 경련을 일으켜 거품을 흘리게 하며 몹시 상하게 하고야 겨우 떠나 가나이다

sentences.original_text: Sometimes a bad spirit takes hold of him
The spirit throws his body first one way then another
sentences.korean_translation: 그 영이 그의 몸을 이리저리 던지고

sentences.original_text: and water comes out of his mouth
The spirit gives him a lot of pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그 영이 그에게 많은 고통을 주고

sentences.original_text: and it does not leave him alone very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 거의 혼자 내버려 두지 않습니다
